name: Talc
headline: Helping companies use their data to build better AI models
description:
Talc builds datasets 100x faster than human labels while outperforming humans in quality.

We build custom datasets in any domain, and have replaced human labels for teams in fields ranging from Medical care to Insurance.

founders.name: Matt Lee, Founder
founders.description:
Ex-Airbnb, Ex-FB SWE.

At Facebook I worked on Election Integrity, using graph algorithms to detect coordinated activity, from foreign election interference to terrorist propaganda.

At Airbnb I worked on moonshots that will (maybe) ship late 2023.

When I'm not working you can catch me snowboarding or climbing!

founders.name: Max Kerr, Founder
founders.description:
Formerly doing privacy at FB and security at Microsoft. I was the tech lead for a 30 person engineering team at Facebook, and was involved in the privacy side of most major product launches over the last two years. 

I founded Talc to help people turn AI tech demos into production apps, along with my long time friend and climbing partner Matt.

# Pull anything from your medical notes
Expert quality medical abstraction, powered by LLMs
Request Access![arrow](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20width='24'%20height='24'%20viewBox='0%200%2024%2024'%20fill='none'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3e%3cpath%20d='M5%2012H19M19%2012L12%205M19%2012L12%2019'%20stroke='white'%20stroke-width='2'%20stroke-linecap='round'%20stroke-linejoin='round'/%3e%3c/svg%3e)
Trusted by enterprises and research centers like
![Company logomark](https://talc.ai/assets/clearwater-6aDkKXXO.png)![Company logomark](https://talc.ai/assets/google-CTAiNV_Q.png)PupPilot![Company logomark](https://talc.ai/assets/andi_logo-CkMYebQm.png)
Features
# Language Models Tailored to Medicine
Generic AI models don’t cut it in medicine. Our LLM-based abstraction delivers precise results, faster
![Abstract Anything](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20width='40'%20height='41'%20viewBox='0%200%2040%2041'%20fill='none'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3e%3cpath%20d='M5%2020.5H6.66667M20%205.5V7.16667M33.3333%2020.5H35M9.33333%209.83333L10.5%2011M30.6667%209.83333L29.5%2011M16.1666%2028.8333H23.8333M15%2027.1667C13.6008%2026.1173%2012.5672%2024.6542%2012.0457%2022.9847C11.5242%2021.3153%2011.5412%2019.524%2012.0943%2017.8648C12.6474%2016.2055%2013.7085%2014.7623%2015.1274%2013.7396C16.5463%2012.717%2018.251%2012.1667%2020%2012.1667C21.749%2012.1667%2023.4537%2012.717%2024.8726%2013.7396C26.2915%2014.7623%2027.3526%2016.2055%2027.9057%2017.8648C28.4588%2019.524%2028.4758%2021.3153%2027.9543%2022.9847C27.4328%2024.6542%2026.3992%2026.1173%2025%2027.1667C24.3493%2027.8108%2023.8593%2028.5991%2023.5698%2029.4677C23.2802%2030.3363%2023.1992%2031.2609%2023.3333%2032.1667C23.3333%2033.0507%2022.9821%2033.8986%2022.357%2034.5237C21.7319%2035.1488%2020.8841%2035.5%2020%2035.5C19.1159%2035.5%2018.2681%2035.1488%2017.643%2034.5237C17.0179%2033.8986%2016.6667%2033.0507%2016.6667%2032.1667C16.8008%2031.2609%2016.7198%2030.3363%2016.4302%2029.4677C16.1407%2028.5991%2015.6507%2027.8108%2015%2027.1667Z'%20stroke='black'%20stroke-width='2'%20stroke-linecap='round'%20stroke-linejoin='round'/%3e%3c/svg%3e)
### Abstract Anything
EMRs are notoriously unstructured. Talc abstracts information like smoking history to get you answers faster.
![High Sensitivity](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20width='40'%20height='41'%20viewBox='0%200%2040%2041'%20fill='none'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3e%3cpath%20d='M7.49998%2018C8.42045%2018%209.16665%2017.2538%209.16665%2016.3334C9.16665%2015.4129%208.42045%2014.6667%207.49998%2014.6667C6.57951%2014.6667%205.83331%2015.4129%205.83331%2016.3334C5.83331%2017.2538%206.57951%2018%207.49998%2018Z'%20stroke='black'%20stroke-width='2'%20stroke-linecap='round'%20stroke-linejoin='round'/%3e%3cpath%20d='M15.8333%209.66671C16.7538%209.66671%2017.5%208.92052%2017.5%208.00004C17.5%207.07957%2016.7538%206.33337%2015.8333%206.33337C14.9128%206.33337%2014.1666%207.07957%2014.1666%208.00004C14.1666%208.92052%2014.9128%209.66671%2015.8333%209.66671Z'%20stroke='black'%20stroke-width='2'%20stroke-linecap='round'%20stroke-linejoin='round'/%3e%3cpath%20d='M15.8333%2026.3334C16.7538%2026.3334%2017.5%2025.5872%2017.5%2024.6667C17.5%2023.7462%2016.7538%2023%2015.8333%2023C14.9128%2023%2014.1666%2023.7462%2014.1666%2024.6667C14.1666%2025.5872%2014.9128%2026.3334%2015.8333%2026.3334Z'%20stroke='black'%20stroke-width='2'%20stroke-linecap='round'%20stroke-linejoin='round'/%3e%3cpath%20d='M7.49998%2034.6667C8.42045%2034.6667%209.16665%2033.9205%209.16665%2033C9.16665%2032.0796%208.42045%2031.3334%207.49998%2031.3334C6.57951%2031.3334%205.83331%2032.0796%205.83331%2033C5.83331%2033.9205%206.57951%2034.6667%207.49998%2034.6667Z'%20stroke='black'%20stroke-width='2'%20stroke-linecap='round'%20stroke-linejoin='round'/%3e%3cpath%20d='M24.1666%2018C25.0871%2018%2025.8333%2017.2538%2025.8333%2016.3334C25.8333%2015.4129%2025.0871%2014.6667%2024.1666%2014.6667C23.2462%2014.6667%2022.5%2015.4129%2022.5%2016.3334C22.5%2017.2538%2023.2462%2018%2024.1666%2018Z'%20stroke='black'%20stroke-width='2'%20stroke-linecap='round'%20stroke-linejoin='round'/%3e%3cpath%20d='M32.5%209.66671C33.4205%209.66671%2034.1666%208.92052%2034.1666%208.00004C34.1666%207.07957%2033.4205%206.33337%2032.5%206.33337C31.5795%206.33337%2030.8333%207.07957%2030.8333%208.00004C30.8333%208.92052%2031.5795%209.66671%2032.5%209.66671Z'%20stroke='black'%20stroke-width='2'%20stroke-linecap='round'%20stroke-linejoin='round'/%3e%3cpath%20d='M24.1666%2034.6667C25.0871%2034.6667%2025.8333%2033.9205%2025.8333%2033C25.8333%2032.0796%2025.0871%2031.3334%2024.1666%2031.3334C23.2462%2031.3334%2022.5%2032.0796%2022.5%2033C22.5%2033.9205%2023.2462%2034.6667%2024.1666%2034.6667Z'%20stroke='black'%20stroke-width='2'%20stroke-linecap='round'%20stroke-linejoin='round'/%3e%3cpath%20d='M32.5%2026.3334C33.4205%2026.3334%2034.1666%2025.5872%2034.1666%2024.6667C34.1666%2023.7462%2033.4205%2023%2032.5%2023C31.5795%2023%2030.8333%2023.7462%2030.8333%2024.6667C30.8333%2025.5872%2031.5795%2026.3334%2032.5%2026.3334Z'%20stroke='black'%20stroke-width='2'%20stroke-linecap='round'%20stroke-linejoin='round'/%3e%3c/svg%3e)
### High Sensitivity
We build medically focused models that understand even the most complicated medical jargon.
![Fast & Efficient](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20width='40'%20height='41'%20viewBox='0%200%2040%2041'%20fill='none'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3e%3cpath%20d='M25%2025.5L30.5833%2031.0833M14.9998%2025.5L9.4165%2031.0833M9.4165%209.91671L14.9998%2015.5M30.5833%209.91671L25%2015.5M26.6667%2020.5C26.6667%2024.1819%2023.6819%2027.1667%2020%2027.1667C16.3181%2027.1667%2013.3333%2024.1819%2013.3333%2020.5C13.3333%2016.8181%2016.3181%2013.8333%2020%2013.8333C23.6819%2013.8333%2026.6667%2016.8181%2026.6667%2020.5ZM35%2020.5C35%2028.7843%2028.2843%2035.5%2020%2035.5C11.7157%2035.5%205%2028.7843%205%2020.5C5%2012.2157%2011.7157%205.5%2020%205.5C28.2843%205.5%2035%2012.2157%2035%2020.5Z'%20stroke='black'%20stroke-width='2'%20stroke-linecap='round'%20stroke-linejoin='round'/%3e%3c/svg%3e)
### Fast & Efficient
Once set up, you can abstract a note in under 10 seconds - all for a fraction of hiring a RN or resident.
# Ready to get started?
Request Access![arrow](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20width='24'%20height='24'%20viewBox='0%200%2024%2024'%20fill='none'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3e%3cpath%20d='M5%2012H19M19%2012L12%205M19%2012L12%2019'%20stroke='white'%20stroke-width='2'%20stroke-linecap='round'%20stroke-linejoin='round'/%3e%3c/svg%3e)
# Engineering blog
Tool and strategies Generative AI teams need to help their companies grow.
View all posts
![Blog post](https://talc-ai.ghost.io/content/images/2025/02/assembly.jpeg)
## Questions and Answers for AI Assistants
![Arrow](https://dashboard.codeparrot.ai/api/image/Z5rIwATIgDR7Dj29/arrow-up.png)
The promise of AI is alluring - the ability to answer any question thrown your way - but without systematically identifying and testing against likely user queries in advance, you're flying blind and risking costly mistakes.
![Avatar](https://talc-ai.ghost.io/content/images/2025/02/me_headshot--1-of-1---1-.jpg)![Contrast](https://dashboard.codeparrot.ai/api/image/Z5rIwATIgDR7Dj29/contrast.png)
Matt LeeThu Mar 14 2024
![Blog post](https://talc-ai.ghost.io/content/images/2025/02/people.png)
## On LLM testing strategies
![Arrow](https://dashboard.codeparrot.ai/api/image/Z5rIwATIgDR7Dj29/arrow-up.png)
Now that AI tools are starting to make their way into production, we're starting to see hilarious mistakes as well – from Google's Gemini Launch to a car dealership selling a truck for $1. The old software testing paradigms are broken – but it's not clear what will take its place. There are a bunch of attempts at new testing paradigms, but each one comes with it's own downsides. Let's break down a few of them. 1. Human review This is what the BigCos in the tech world are doing – armies of huma
![Avatar](https://talc-ai.ghost.io/content/images/2025/02/2023-YC-Summer-June-19-Sunday-Day-2_163.jpg)![Contrast](https://dashboard.codeparrot.ai/api/image/Z5rIwATIgDR7Dj29/contrast.png)
Max KerrFri Feb 09 2024
![Blog post](https://talc-ai.ghost.io/content/images/2025/02/glass.png)
## Data Generation
![Arrow](https://dashboard.codeparrot.ai/api/image/Z5rIwATIgDR7Dj29/arrow-up.png)
Let's consider the challenge of answering multi-step questions, like those introduced in Meta's GAIA paper. One of the interesting challenges with improving LLMs is not just answering individual questions, but also stringing together enough chain of thought breakdowns to be able to answer these questions. For example, how would you train an LLM to answer a question like this? In 1886, a notable achievement in chemistry was made by a French scientist, who became the first person to isolate a ce
![Avatar](https://talc-ai.ghost.io/content/images/2025/02/me_headshot--1-of-1---1-.jpg)![Contrast](https://dashboard.codeparrot.ai/api/image/Z5rIwATIgDR7Dj29/contrast.png)
Matt LeeThu Sep 21 2023
![Talc AI](https://talc.ai/assets/talc-BDcgwSz2.svg)
[Features](https://talc.ai/<#features>)Contact Us[Engineering Blog](https://talc.ai/</blog>)

generated_description:
### Company Overview: Talc

- **Founded**: 2023  
- **Location**: Seattle, WA  
- **Size**: 3 employees  
- **Y Combinator Batch**: S23  
- **Website**: [talc.ai](https://talc.ai)  

---

### Mission

Talc's mission is straightforward: **Helping companies use their data to build better AI models.** This is not just a catchphrase—it’s the foundation of what they do.

### What They Do

Originally focused on dataset creation, Talc strives to build custom datasets **100x faster than human labeling**, all while ensuring superior quality. They have successfully replaced human labels across diverse sectors, including **medical care** and **insurance**.

Certainly, anyone in the AI sector knows how critical training data is. The quality and speed of data preparation can define the success of a model’s performance. Talc's unique approach effectively takes on the burdensome task of data labeling, allowing enterprises to focus on refining their AI applications.

### Services and Features

Talc specializes in harnessing **Large Language Models (LLMs)** for medical data abstraction. Here are some standout features:

- **Expert Quality Abstraction**: Using advanced models, Talc abstracts critical information from unstructured data, such as electronic medical records (EMRs), to answer specific inquiries swiftly.
  
- **Tailored for Medicine**: Unlike generic models, their solutions are designed to adeptly handle complex medical jargon, making them particularly useful in healthcare contexts.

- **Efficiency**: Talc reports that once configured, their system can abstract notes in under **10 seconds**, which is notably faster and more cost-effective than employing human resources like registered nurses or residents.

### Current Collaborations

Talc is already trusted by various enterprises and research institutions, including notable names like Google and PupPilot.

### Team and Guidance

Under the mentorship of **Michael Seibel** at Y Combinator, Talc is growing a tight-knit team of three. This small but agile crew is positioned to iterate rapidly on their offerings and refine their technology.

### For Aspirants

If you’re curious to see how Talc can streamline your data processes or want to delve deeper into generative AI strategies, they have an **Engineering Blog** that shares insights and knowledge relevant to AI development. 

---

In a nutshell, Talc epitomizes the potential of AI-driven data solutions, proving that with the right technology, we can elevate the way we manage information—starting with a sector as critical as healthcare. If you’re working with data, you should definitely keep an eye on what they’re doing.
